statements: SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencers ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, influencer_email FROM influencers WHERE influencers.influencer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0 ORDER BY followers_count DESC
SELECT influencer_email FROM influencers WHERE followers_count < 1000
SELECT influencer_id FROM influencers WHERE followers_count BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE engagement_rate < 2.0 AND followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY engagement_rate ASC
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 5000
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT brand_name, partnership_type FROM Collaborations WHERE collaboration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 10000;
SELECT influencer_id, brand_name, partnership_type FROM Collaborations ORDER BY influencer_id, collaboration_date DESC;
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencers WHERE followers > 10000 ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT brand_name, partnership_type, collaboration_date FROM Collaborations WHERE collaboration_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY collaboration_date ASC;
SELECT name, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 5.0 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY name;
SELECT influencer_id, brand_name FROM Collaborations WHERE partnership_type = 'sponsorship' ORDER BY influencer_id;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers;
SELECT * FROM collaborations ORDER BY collaboration_date DESC;
SELECT partnership_name, partner_id, start_date FROM partnerships WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 100000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT collaboration_name, collaborator_id FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_type = 'Sponsored' AND collaboration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE influencer_type = 'Celebrity' ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT collaboration_name, collaboration_type, collaboration_date FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT partner_id, partnership_name, partnership_type FROM partnerships WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT influencer_id, influencer_name, followers_count, influencer_type FROM influencers WHERE influencer_type = 'Micro-Influencer' ORDER BY followers_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM influencers;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT influencer_name, engagement_rate FROM influencers ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT partner_name, partner_email FROM partners WHERE partner_company = 'ABC Company';
SELECT collaboration_date, collaboration_description FROM collaborations ORDER BY collaboration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT influencer_name, followers_count FROM influencers WHERE followers_count > 5000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;

SELECT influencer_name, partner_name, collaboration_date FROM influencers JOIN collaborations ON influencers.influencer_id = collaborations.influencer_id JOIN partners ON collaborations.partner_id = partners.partner_id ORDER BY collaboration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM opportunities WHERE opportunity_status = 'pending' AND collaboration_id IN (SELECT collaboration_id FROM collaborations WHERE influencer_id = 3) ORDER BY opportunity_id DESC;
SELECT partner_id, COUNT(collaboration_id) AS num_collaborations FROM collaborations GROUP BY partner_id ORDER BY num_collaborations DESC;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT name, followers FROM Influencers ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) FROM Influencers GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM Brands WHERE industry = 'Fashion';
SELECT brand_id, name, website FROM Brands ORDER BY brand_id LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Influencers;
SELECT name, followers, category FROM Influencers WHERE engagement_rate > 5 ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT brand_id, name, industry, website FROM Brands WHERE website IS NOT NULL AND industry = 'Fashion' ORDER BY brand_id ASC;

SELECT influence.name, collab.start_date, collab.end_date, collab.payment FROM Influencers influence JOIN Collaborations collab ON influence.influencer_id = collab.influencer_id WHERE collab.payment > 1000 ORDER BY collab.payment DESC;

SELECT brand.name, inter.interaction_date, inter.interaction_type FROM Brands brand JOIN Collaborations collab ON brand.brand_id = collab.brand_id JOIN Interactions inter ON collab.collaboration_id = inter.collaboration_id WHERE inter.interaction_type = 'Like' ORDER BY inter.interaction_date DESC;
